messages: 9ecd0c6620149bd9ec69488edbacb270 (17:54): i have used a shell script to start my app on X11. the script exports LD_LIBRARY_PATH so that the app can find necessary Qt libs and other libs as well.
9ecd0c6620149bd9ec69488edbacb270 (17:55): is there any convenient way for adding a link to the app for example on the desktop (KDE)
9ecd0c6620149bd9ec69488edbacb270 (17:55): a link to the executable doesn't naturally work, but for some reason a link to the script doesn't work either
9ecd0c6620149bd9ec69488edbacb270 (17:57): the script is taken from here: http://doc.trolltech.com/4.2/deployment-x11.html#creating-the-application-package
9ecd0c6620149bd9ec69488edbacb270 (17:57): err.. the script uses current working directory. that's why it doesn't work :)
7b8cb232166dd6d0b380e06caa6c034b (18:10): can I have a qtnode wiki account ?
7b8cb232166dd6d0b380e06caa6c034b (18:13): well I was just going to fix some grammar and typo's anyway. so no hurry
021b7bf3ff2076c746a1ed6f90658a06 (18:16): you will need to wait for nuge or ahigerd. im not sure if non admins may create acounts
5d45976faf5d8bc7758a97a5e0618b25 (18:17): I need help! QDoubleValidator doesn't work!
5d45976faf5d8bc7758a97a5e0618b25 (18:23): in qtdemo->widgets->line edits i have this line:    validatorLineEdit->setValidator(new QDoubleValidator(-999.0,
5d45976faf5d8bc7758a97a5e0618b25 (18:23): but i can type more then 1000
7b8cb232166dd6d0b380e06caa6c034b (18:26): is 1000.0 accepted when you hit Enter ?
021b7bf3ff2076c746a1ed6f90658a06 (18:30): try creating the validator on the stack, just a guess
9ecd0c6620149bd9ec69488edbacb270 (18:32): it surely gets out of the scope if you create it on stack
caacdffd7a4aa3937fabe8e185e5165e (18:33): add thios validator: static QRegExpValidator ipValidator(QRegExp("^(\\x4d){0,1}[0-9]{0,3}"))
021b7bf3ff2076c746a1ed6f90658a06 (18:33): i mixe up stack and heap all the time
021b7bf3ff2076c746a1ed6f90658a06 (18:34): whatever. amybe i confused simehting. was just a guess anyway

14b55763a293b2b222c2d425b92bf06a (19:56): Isn't it possible to create a class which needs also signals and slots but also methods with template arguments?
021b7bf3ff2076c746a1ed6f90658a06 (19:59): ahigerd made a mookup for some hack that could do it. but qt itself isnt able to do that out od the bo due to QObjects Template limitation
